quantile(0.67, rate(velor_execution_get_next_task_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / avg(block_executor_concurrency{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}) ) / quantile(0.67, rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])  )

quantile(0.67, rate(final_output_extraction_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ) / quantile(0.67, rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])  )

quantile(0.67, rate(final_result_collection_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ) / quantile(0.67, rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])  )

quantile(0.67, rate(update_counters_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ) / quantile(0.67, rate(velor_executor_execute_block_seconds_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])  )

panels.description: The counter that indicates the number of errors reported.

targets.expr: velor_executor_error_total{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Executor Error Counter

panels.description: The per-block gas consumed by parallel execution (BlockSTM) or sequential execution.

targets.expr: quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_block_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"execution_gas|io_gas|non_storage_gas", mode="parallel"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_block_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"execution_gas|io_gas|non_storage_gas", mode="parallel"}[$interval]))

quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_block_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"execution_gas|io_gas|non_storage_gas", mode="sequential"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_block_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"execution_gas|io_gas|non_storage_gas", mode="sequential"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Per-block execution gas

panels.description: The per-block gas consumed by parallel execution (BlockSTM) or sequential execution.

targets.expr: quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_block_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"storage_in_octas|storage_in_gas", mode="parallel"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_block_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"storage_in_octas|storage_in_gas", mode="parallel"}[$interval]))

quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_block_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"storage_in_octas|storage_in_gas", mode="sequential"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_block_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage=~"storage_in_octas|storage_in_gas", mode="sequential"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Per-block storage gas

panels.description: The per-block gas consumed by parallel execution (BlockSTM) or sequential execution.

targets.expr: quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_block_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage='storage_in_octas', mode="parallel"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_block_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage='storage_in_octas', mode="parallel"}[$interval]))

quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_block_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage='storage_in_octas', mode="sequential"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_block_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage='storage_in_octas', mode="sequential"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Per-block storage fee

panels.description: The avg txn gas consumed by parallel execution (BlockSTM) or sequential execution.

targets.expr: quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_txn_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage!='storage_in_octas', mode="parallel"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_txn_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage!='storage_in_octas', mode="parallel"}[$interval]))

quantile by(stage) (0.5, rate(velor_execution_txn_gas_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage!='storage_in_octas', mode="sequential"}[$interval]) /  rate(velor_execution_txn_gas_count{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage!='storage_in_octas', mode="sequential"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Avg txn gas

panels.description: The per-block gas consumed by parallel execution (BlockSTM) or sequential execution.
panels.title: Execution speed - run-time gas / s

panels.description: The rate of the parallel / sequential execution exceeding the per-block gas limit.

targets.expr: rate(velor_execution_gas_limit_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", mode="parallel"}[$interval])

rate(velor_execution_gas_limit_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", mode="sequential"}[$interval])

panels.title: Execution exceed block gas limit rate

panels.description: The average time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: rate(velor_execution_transaction_shuffle_seconds_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_execution_transaction_shuffle_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Avg Txn shuffling time

panels.description: The average time spent to dedup the txns in a block

targets.expr: rate(velor_execution_transaction_dedup_seconds_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_execution_transaction_dedup_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Avg Txn dedup time

panels.description: The time spent waiting for batches, per second

targets.expr: rate(velor_consensus_batch_wait_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Batch wait duration (per s)

targets.expr: avg by (round_id)(max by(shard_id, round_id) (rate(sharded_block_execution_by_rounds_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ))

rate(sharded_block_execution_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(sharded_execution_result_aggregation_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(wait_for_sharded_output_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

sum by (round_id) (sum by (round_id, shard_id) (rate(sharded_block_executor_txn_count_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ) / sum by(round_id, shard_id) (rate(sharded_block_execution_by_rounds_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ) )

sum by (round_id) (avg by (round_id, shard_id) (rate(sharded_block_executor_txn_count_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ) )

panels.title: (to fix) Sharded execution transaction counts by round

targets.expr: avg by (round_id)(max by(shard_id, round_id) (rate(sharded_block_execution_by_rounds_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) ))

rate(sharded_block_execution_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(sharded_execution_result_aggregation_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

rate(wait_for_sharded_output_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

avg(rate(drop_state_view_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]))

max(avg by(shard_id) (rate(execute_shard_command_seconds_sum{ chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])))
